events.name: Groq Workshop

events.description: Join Graham Steele, Sr. Product Marketing Manager, for an interactive workshop where you'll learn how to tap into Groq speed to build innovative, multimodal, and agentic applications. Explore open-source demos and integrate Groq's cutting-edge technology into your projects. Perfect for developers of all levels, this session will help you create faster, more efficient, and engaging apps.

events.name: Solace Workshop
events.subtitle: üîó Connecting the Dots: Event-Driven Architecture!
events.description: This workshop covers the fundamentals of Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) with a focus on how Solace implements it. Learn why and how Software Developers and Architects use this pattern. We'll also guide students through connecting their applications to a Solace Event Broker for 'Pub/Sub' (publish/subscribe) functionality. This session serves as a quick bootstrap for participants to get set up and ready to qualify for our challenge.

events.name: MLH Workshop
events.subtitle: Figma to Code: Learning Design with Dev Mode
events.description: Figma Dev Mode is a new Figma feature designed to create smoother collaboration between designers and developers, as well as empower hackers to level up their own design-skills. The tool provides hackers with a detailed view of design files, including access to specs, assets, and code snippets, ensuring accuracy in the design implementation while saving time in the process. Whether you‚Äôre completely new to designing websites or want to expand your existing skill set, this workshop is a great way to learn one of the most developer friendly and professionally utilized design tools on the market.

events.name: Coinbase Workshop
events.subtitle: Lucas Matheson Presents...!
events.description: Lucas Matheson, CEO of Coinbase Canada, delivers an insightful talk üí¨ about the company‚Äôs mission and its role in shaping the future of digital finance üåêüí∞. He shares an overview of the innovative tools and approaches driving Coinbase‚Äôs success üîçüíª. Lucas highlights the impactful work being done to advance the industry and empower users. The session concludes with an open Q&A, giving attendees the opportunity to connect with him directly ‚ùìü§ù.
